rules_text: When Somber Stargazer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, Somber Stargazer studies. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)[/i]
